Description: Rich and decadent chocolate cake made with high-quality cocoa powder and topped with chocolate ganache.
Creamy and smooth cheesecake with a graham cracker crust, topped with your choice of fruit compote.
Zesty lemon tart made with freshly squeezed lemon juice and a buttery shortcrust pastry.
Classic apple pie made with sweet, crisp apples and a flaky, buttery crust.
Moist and fluffy red velvet cake with cream cheese frosting, perfect for any occasion.
Delicious carrot cake made with grated carrots, walnuts, and cream cheese frosting.
Classic Italian dessert made with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers, mascarpone cheese, and cocoa powder.
Tangy and refreshing key lime pie with a graham cracker crust, perfect for summer.
Moist and flavorful banana bread made with ripe bananas and a hint of cinnamon.
Classic pecan pie with a layer of rich caramel sauce, all in a flaky pie crust.
